title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) FOR SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO FOUR MILLION FIFTY THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED THIRTY-EIGHT PESOS AND 44/100 (PHP 4,050,738.44) CHARGEABLE AGAINST PS SAVINGS FROM ABOLISHED PLANTILLA POSITIONS IN THE AMOUNT OF SIX HUNDRED THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED THIRTY EIGHT AND 44/100 (PHP 600,738.44); FROM SAVINGS FROM MOOE (BANAMOS FESTIVAL) UNDER MO - TOURISM OFFICE IN THE AMOUNT OF FIVE HUNDRED FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 550,000.00) AND FROM REPROGRAMMING OF APPROPRIATIONS OF VARIOUS GAD - RELATED MOOE'S IN THE AMOUNT OF TWO MILLION NINE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 2,900,000.00) AND REVERTING THE AMOUNT OF THREE MILLION PESOS (PHP 3,000,000.00) FOR MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND - CURRENT APPROPRIATION FROM MAINTENANCE AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSE TO CAPITAL OUTLAY. Author H Councilo ikn/C'.GPelegrma
